docs.summary: Responsible for managing all account and team data

permissions.name: Create Accounts
permissions.description: Allows certified partners to create Wix accounts.

params.name: user
params.doc:
A user to be created under the new account.
 Currently the user will be set as the account owner by default.

params.name: roles
params.doc: roles to be assigned to the user in the new account, if any (default is OWNER)

docs.summary:
Creates a new Wix account, and a new Wix user under this account, as the account owner.
 If the context contains a targetAccountId, the account will be created as a sub account of the target account (which will be its parent).
 Otherwise, the account will be created without a parent account.

params.name: studio
params.doc: whether to mark the account as `studio`

docs.summary: creates account for the logged in user

members.name: userId
members.doc: the user id

members.name: firstName
members.doc: user's first name (if exists)

members.name: lastName
members.doc: user's last name (if exists)

members.name: email
members.doc: user's email

members.name: img
members.doc: user's image (if exists)

members.name: isAccountOwner
members.doc: is the user the account owner

members.name: roles
members.doc: DEPRECATED field of roles

members.name: joinedAt
members.doc: the date the user joined the account

members.name: policies
members.doc: user's assigned policies

members.name: policyId
members.doc: policy id

members.name: policyName
members.doc: policy name - representing role name

members.name: isTeam
members.doc: indicates if this is a team account

members.name: accountImg
members.doc:
the account image (display)
relevant mainly for CoBranded accounts

members.name: accountBanner
members.doc:
the account banner (display)
relevant mainly for CoBranded accounts

members.name: accountLogo
members.doc:
the account logo (display)
wll be shown as the account logo in the UI (top right corner, contributor list etc..)

members.name: coBranding
members.doc:
account co branding flag (if exists)
an enum for CoBranding flag contains 4 possible options:
None - the account is not CoBranded
CoBranded - the account has a CoBranding flag
CoBranded_Customer_New - the account is a contributor of a CoBranded account. This account was created because of the contributor invite
CoBranded_Customer_Existing - the account is a contributor of a CoBranded account. This account was created before the invite of the contributor invite

members.name: websiteUrl
members.doc: account's website URL (shown on co branding customers sites)

members.name: parentAccountId
members.doc: the id of the parent account of this account, if it has a parent

members.name: accountId
members.doc: account id

members.name: slug
members.doc: account slug - used for the free URL prefix

members.name: accountName
members.doc: account name (display)

members.name: accountImg
members.doc: DEPRECATED field of account image

members.name: status
members.doc: account status

members.name: accountOwner
members.doc: account owner user id

members.name: accountProperties
members.doc: account extra properties

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: the account creation date

members.name: dateUpdated
members.doc: last time account was updated

members.name: accountId
members.doc: The account id

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: userId
members.doc: the user id that his account we query

members.name: userId
members.doc: the user id that his accounts we query

members.name: paging
members.doc: Limited to max 20 at a single request

docs.summary: A User to be created under an implicitly provided accountId: must have a unique email.

members.name: email
members.doc: a unique user's email address; must be provided

members.name: ssoIdentities
members.doc:
list of user's identities (as addition to email, which is a must at the moment);
 can be empty

members.name: userDetails
members.doc: optional additional user details

members.name: emailAddress
members.doc: user's email

members.name: isVerified
members.doc:
'is_verified'=true in UserCreateRequest means the API caller knows the User's email address is verified,
 and it will be stored in our system as such, without us trying to verify it ourselves

docs.summary: Single Sign On (aka. SSO) identity; user is identified via SSO authentication response token params, as specified by OpenID Connect (aka. OIDC) protocol

members.name: ssoId
members.doc: ssoId represents an SSO setting (URLs, clientId, secret, etc. as required by OIDC protocol) for a specific Identity-Provider (aka. IdP) for a specific Wix account

members.name: userId
members.doc:
userId, as stored in IdP - in general should be "sub" claim of OIDC protocol,
 or any other alternative, specified by IdP (Identity Provider)

members.name: language
members.doc: language in 2 letters lowercase format - i.e "en", "es"

members.name: clientIp
members.doc:
client_id represents the original Client IP from which a request was made.
 This is useful in case where a createUser API is called by some server call, which, in turn, has been called by some client from another IP - like is in Vista flow.
 We check this IP against OFAC countries list - a Legal request.

members.name: user
members.doc:
A user to be created under the new account.
 Currently the user will be set as the account owner by default.

members.name: roles
members.doc: roles to be assigned to the user in the new account, if any (default is OWNER)

members.name: account
members.doc: The newly created account

members.name: coBranding
members.doc:
account co branding flag (if exists)
an enum for CoBranding flag contains 4 possible options:
None - the account is not CoBranded
CoBranded - the account has a CoBranding flag
CoBranded_Customer_New - the account is a contributor of a CoBranded account. This account was created because of the contributor invite
CoBranded_Customer_Existing - the account is a contributor of a CoBranded account. This account was created before the invite of the contributor invite

docs.summary:
enum with all available statuses of account Possible values are:
  • ACTIVE
  • BLOCKED
  • DELETED

co branding flag options for account Possible values are:
  • None
  • CoBranded
  • CoBranded_Customer_New
  • CoBranded_Customer_Existing
